item.title: Basics of Building: Foundation Fundamentals Part 3
item.description: In our final Foundation Fundamentals series, weâ€™re talking about a foundation that is most commonly known to homeowners as a Pier and Beam foundation. We call it a Crawl-Space Foundation and use it most often when clients are in a floodplain and require an elevated home. **Crawl-Space Foundation **For those of you who live in a floodplain (hello to our friends in Meyerland + Bellaire!) you need a Crawl-Space Foundation. This is a typical pier and beam foundation, which elevates the home leaving a crawl-space underneath.
